I don't waste my time with strangers unless they press me. In that case I educated myself to the history of this definition. In the 1970s Sociologist Patricia Bidol defined it in a book "Prejudice plus power = Racism". 

The idea the majority benefit from prejudice of the other majority, and the minority are disadvantaged by that same prejudice. Status means nothing in this definition.
